leavePageModal.headline: Warning
leavePageModal.description: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure that you want to leave this page?

actions.actionsDisabledInLanguage: Categories can only be created in the default language

types.title: Category type
types.help: The 'Category' type describes a shop category that can be called normally. A 'Structure category' cannot be viewed as an actual category, but can be used as a structure point for ordering products. When using the type 'Customizable link' the category can be replaced by an own link to which the category link leads.

entry-point.title: Entry point
entry-point.descriptionGeneral: You have assigned this node in the following sales channels as an entry point for the main navigation:
entry-point.descriptionMenu: The entry point is also automatically the home page of these sales channels. If this should not be the case and instead the first active main menu item should be your start page, you can change this here: All subcategories will be deleted, too.

products.productAssignmentEmptyStateSubline: Use the search to add products.

modal.textDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you really want to delete the category "{name}"?
modal.textDeleteChildrenConfirm: All subcategories will be deleted, too.
modal.textDeleteMultipleConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the {count} selected categories?
